headline: Where is Viatris Inc. (VTRS) Headed According to the Street?
summary: Viatris Inc. (NASDAQ:VTRS) is one of the best healthcare stocks under $50 to invest in. Viatris Inc. (NASDAQ:VTRS) received a rating update from Piper Sandler on January 28, which adjusted the price target on the stock to $12 from $9 while maintaining a Neutral rating on the shares.
